title: (x) Nau Mai script logo – Affair {Marten F}
content:
hi there...

Just got this logo to recreate, but cant find the right fonts for it.  
The swish font looks a bit like affair but than not...

Can anyone help me?

regards jörg

author: agostini

comments.content: hmmm ok my dashes didnt work (2013)...
What’s not [Affair](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190345/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000181) about this? It’s a perfect match...
yes, it is. Not my kern. lol

That’s a logo? Surely not.

Nick Cooke

hmmm ok...  
i must have seen a version of affair (the ’n’ looked different) a well...  
thanks guys...

nick...well it is, or thats what the client gave me...  
but it will look a bit different anyway, once im finished  
with it - smile...
